name: mikado
description: Web's smartest virtual DOM templating engine.
author: Thomas Wilkerling

scripts.compile: node task/compile && echo Compile Complete. && exit 0
scripts.build: node task/build RELEASE=min USE_POLYFILL=false DEBUG=false SUPPORT_CACHE=true SUPPORT_EVENTS=true SUPPORT_STORAGE=true SUPPORT_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_CACHE_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_ASYNC=true SUPPORT_TRANSPORT=true SUPPORT_TEMPLATE_EXTENSION=true SUPPORT_REACTIVE=true SUPPORT_POOLS=true SUPPORT_COMPILE=true && exit 0
scripts.build:light: node task/build RELEASE=light USE_POLYFILL=false DEBUG=false SUPPORT_CACHE=true SUPPORT_EVENTS=false SUPPORT_STORAGE=false SUPPORT_HELPERS=false SUPPORT_CACHE_HELPERS=false SUPPORT_ASYNC=false SUPPORT_TRANSPORT=false SUPPORT_TEMPLATE_EXTENSION=false SUPPORT_REACTIVE=false SUPPORT_POOLS=true SUPPORT_COMPILE=false && exit 0
scripts.build:es5: node task/build RELEASE=es5 USE_POLYFILL=true DEBUG=false SUPPORT_CACHE=true SUPPORT_EVENTS=true SUPPORT_STORAGE=true SUPPORT_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_CACHE_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_ASYNC=true SUPPORT_TRANSPORT=true SUPPORT_TEMPLATE_EXTENSION=true SUPPORT_REACTIVE=true SUPPORT_POOLS=true SUPPORT_COMPILE=true && exit 0
scripts.build:debug: node task/build RELEASE=debug USE_POLYFILL=true DEBUG=true SUPPORT_CACHE=true SUPPORT_EVENTS=true SUPPORT_STORAGE=true SUPPORT_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_CACHE_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_ASYNC=true SUPPORT_TRANSPORT=true SUPPORT_TEMPLATE_EXTENSION=true SUPPORT_REACTIVE=true SUPPORT_POOLS=true SUPPORT_COMPILE=true && exit 0
scripts.build:pre: node task/build RELEASE=pre USE_POLYFILL=true DEBUG=false SUPPORT_CACHE=true SUPPORT_EVENTS=true SUPPORT_STORAGE=true SUPPORT_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_CACHE_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_ASYNC=true SUPPORT_TRANSPORT=true SUPPORT_TEMPLATE_EXTENSION=true SUPPORT_REACTIVE=true SUPPORT_POOLS=true SUPPORT_COMPILE=true && exit 0
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:light && npm run build:es5 && npm run build:pre && npm run build:debug
scripts.test: npm run build:pre && cd test && npm install && mikado-compile template.html && mikado-compile proxy.html && npm run test
